author: cnbc.com
title: Cameo Resources Corp. Appoints New Board Member
text:
VANCOUVER, British Columbia, April 30, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Cameo Resources Corp. (TSX Venture:CRU) (OTC:CRUUF) (FWB:SY7D) (the “ Company ” or “ Cameo Resources ”) is pleased to announce that Mr. Charnjit (Johnny) Singh Jagpal has been appointed to the Company’s board of directors.
Mr. Jagpal brings over 20 years of accounting experience from various industries and has extensive corporate tax and audit experience. Mr. Jagpal is a Certified Public Accountant and obtained his designation in August of 2010. He also received a Bachelor’s degree in Accounting in 2002 from the British Columbia Institute of Technology with minor in Financial Management.
CAMEO RESOURCES CORP.
“ Akash Patel”
